name: Return the Flavour
description:
Return the Flavour is a game where a player takes the role of a Spice Merchant who needs to expand his aroma prosperity while exploring the islands and defending his possessions from mischievous pirates. Strategy is important - the player has to learn how to best hunt, trade, and fortify their spices in a limited number of turns, for those are truly worth a king's ransom!

Pepper? Cinnamon? Saffron? Which are you going to sell at the highest price to get TO THE TOP?

Genre: Single Player, Turn-based strategy game, Roguelike

Core Player Experience: Strategy, fun, economy builder

Target Audience: Everyone

Playtime: 3-5 minutes
